title: RF Software Engineer
summary:
Do you have a passion for invention and self-challenge? Do you thrive on pushing the limits of what’s considered feasible. As part of a world class modem team, you’ll craft sophisticated groundbreaking embedded firmware that deliver more performance in our products than ever before. You’ll work across fields to transform improved hardware elements into a single, integrated design. Join us, and you’ll help us innovate new cellular technologies that continually outperform the previous iterations. By collaborating with other product development groups across Apple, you’ll push the industry boundaries of what wireless systems can do and improve the product experience for our customers across the world. Do you want to have an impact on every single Apple product?

As a RF Software Engineer on the Cellular FW team, you will be at the center of the embedded 5G/4G/multimode cellular firmware effort within a silicon design group responsible for crafting and productizing innovative cellular SoCs! This position requires someone comfortable with all aspects of embedded software development, that thrives in a multifaceted multi-functional organization, is not afraid to debate ideas openly, and is flexible enough to shift on constantly evolving requirements.
description:
-  Design and Implement RF device drivers and RF software to control RF transceivers and RF front end components with detailed timing requirements.

-  Design, develop and optimize the cellular modem processing algorithms pertaining to Baseband and RF components in a cellular system.

-  Work with Baseband & RF systems and hardware designers to define hardware architecture and software computing requirements.

-  Work with multi-functional teams to lead dependencies while driving the key Radio features.
key_qualifications:
Minimum BS with 3 + years of relevant industry experience
Knowledge of mobile communications in 4G/5G 3GPP protocols and radio architecture and Interfaces.
Knowledge of RF transceiver and RF front end components control for 4G/5G radio.
Understanding of RF calibrations for compensating RF impairments.
Understanding of design principles to meet tight real time deadlines a plus.
Deep understanding of software engineering principles, and core computer science fundamentals.
Excellent in embedded C/C++ programming, and working experience with compilers, build and source code control tools.
Experience with using RF Test equipment for RF validation and debugging.
Proficiency with debugging in embedded software systems.
Familiarity with JTAG.
education_experience: Minimum BS with 3 + years of relevant industry experience
